revreply:
We are thrilled to hear about your excellent experience at the Wig-O-Mania hair store in Hyderabad. 
Thank you so much for your review. 
We are determined to make a difference in the life of each and every person who walks through our door at any of our stores. 
Appreciations like yours motivates and assures us that we are doing things right. 
Thank you very much.
